headline.main: FDA OKs Breakthrough Cholesterol Drug for High-Risk Patients
headline.print_headline: FDA OKs Breakthrough Cholesterol Drug for High-Risk Patients

docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved a first-of-a-kind drug that lowers artery-clogging cholesterol more than older drugs that have been prescribed for decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved a first-of-a-kind drug that lowers artery-clogging cholesterol more than older drugs that have been prescribed for decades.

headline.main: AT&T Buys DirecTV, Now Biggest Traditional TV Provider in US
headline.print_headline: AT&T Buys DirecTV, Now Biggest Traditional TV Provider in US

docs.snippet: Even as TV watchers increasingly go online, AT&T has become the country's biggest traditional TV provider with its $48.5 billion purchase of DirecTV....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even as TV watchers increasingly go online, AT&T has become the country's biggest traditional TV provider with its $48.5 billion purchase of DirecTV.

headline.main: Turkish Bombing of Islamic State Marks End of Tacit Truce
headline.print_headline: Turkish Bombing of Islamic State Marks End of Tacit Truce

docs.snippet: Last month, the first edition of the Islamic State group's Turkish-language magazine contained not a word of criticism of the Turkish government. This week, the second edition calls Istanbul occupied territory and blasts President Recep Tayyip Erd...
docs.lead_paragraph: Last month, the first edition of the Islamic State group's Turkish-language magazine contained not a word of criticism of the Turkish government. This week, the second edition calls Istanbul occupied territory and blasts President Recep Tayyip Erdogan as a tyrant.

headline.main: AT&T, DirecTV Complete Merger to Form Biggest Pay-TV Company
headline.print_headline: AT&T, DirecTV Complete Merger to Form Biggest Pay-TV Company

docs.snippet: The No. 2 U.S. wireless carrier AT&T Inc and the biggest satellite-TV provider DirecTV became the country's largest pay-TV company on Friday, completing their $48.5 billion merger after receiving final regulatory approval....
docs.lead_paragraph: The No. 2 U.S. wireless carrier AT&T Inc and the biggest satellite-TV provider DirecTV became the country's largest pay-TV company on Friday, completing their $48.5 billion merger after receiving final regulatory approval.

headline.main: Clinton Proposes Changes to Corporate Tax Code to Focus on Long Term
headline.print_headline: Clinton Proposes Changes to Corporate Tax Code to Focus on Long Term

docs.snippet: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton proposed U.S. corporate tax reforms on Friday including a sliding scale for capital gains taxes and changes in executive compensation to encourage long-term growth to benefit American workers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton proposed U.S. corporate tax reforms on Friday including a sliding scale for capital gains taxes and changes in executive compensation to encourage long-term growth to benefit American workers.

headline.main: U.S. in Good Shape to Win 2016 Ryder Cup, Says Lehman
headline.print_headline: U.S. in Good Shape to Win 2016 Ryder Cup, Says Lehman

docs.snippet: Vice-captain Tom Lehman believes the United States "are in very good shape to win the Ryder Cup" next year for the first time since 2008....
docs.lead_paragraph: Vice-captain Tom Lehman believes the United States "are in very good shape to win the Ryder Cup" next year for the first time since 2008.

docs.snippet: Race leader Chris Froome hit out at defending Tour de France champion Vincenzo Nibali for launching his stage-winning attack just when the Briton suffered a mechanical problem on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Race leader Chris Froome hit out at defending Tour de France champion Vincenzo Nibali for launching his stage-winning attack just when the Briton suffered a mechanical problem on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Walker Announces Senior Presidential Campaign Team

headline.main: The New Stars of the Tech Sector
headline.sub: CFOs becoming new stars in tech sector: NYT's Stewart

docs.snippet: James B. Stewart, on CNBC, discusses how chief financial officers like Ruth Porat of Google are bringing new success to technologies companies....

headline.main: Greece Submits Request to IMF for New Loan Facility
headline.print_headline: Greece Submits Request to IMF for New Loan Facility

docs.snippet: Greece has formally submitted a request to the International Monetary Fund for a new loan facility, the country's finance ministry said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greece has formally submitted a request to the International Monetary Fund for a new loan facility, the country's finance ministry said on Friday.
